The Awesome Foundation

Fields of work: All fields of work

Applicant type: Organizations, Individuals

Location of project:

Location of residency:

990 Snapshot

Loading...

Overview:

About UsThe Awesome Foundation is a global community advancing the interest of awesome in the universe, $1000 at a time.Each fully autonomous chapter supports awesome projects through micro-grants, usually given out monthly. These micro-grants, $1000 or the local equivalent, come out of pockets of the chapter's "trustees" and are given on a no-strings-attached basis to people and groups working on awesome projects.What do you mean by "Awesome"?Every chapter interprets "awesome" for itself. As such, awesome projects include initiatives in a wide range of areas including arts, technology, community development, and more. Many awesome projects are novel or experimental, and evoke surprise and delight. Awesome sometimes challenges and often inspires. Browse some grants on the chapter pages of this site to see what we mean! We're still waiting for something with dinosaurs (hint, hint).Please see individual chapter pages for preferences & restrictions.

Unlock full grant details and application links

Eligibility

Anyone is eligible for a grant â€” individuals, groups, and organizations alike. If you can fill out the application form, you can apply.Most chapters show a strong preference for projects that contribute to their own communities, though some occasionally consider applications from further afield. Try to apply to a chapter near you, in a location where you have roots, or that you think would have a particular interest your idea. If this isn't possible, you can select "Any" on the application form, or apply to one of a handful of thematic chapters.
